result.eng: Can I can drop in to you in the afternoon?
result.ga: An féidir liom bualadh isteach chugat tráthnóna
result.orig: An féidir liom bualadh isteach chugat tráthnóna
result.html: An féidir liom bualadh isteach chugat tráthnónaCan I can drop in to you in the afternoon?
result.ponchtml: An féidir liom bualaḋ isteaċ ċugat tráṫnónaCan I can drop in to you in the afternoon?

result.eng: My classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ga: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.orig: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.html: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo ċuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceaṫair a ċlog ċuile ṫráṫnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.

result.eng: The course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.
result.ga: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé Sathairn
result.orig: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé Sathairn
result.html: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé SathairnThe course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an cúrsa críoċnaiṫe tráṫnóna Dé hAoine agus beiḋ mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé SaṫairnThe course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ga: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.orig: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.html: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóighIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ponchtml: Imeoiḋ sé ag a dó a ċlog sa tráṫnóna agus beiḋ sé i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫart ar ċeaṫrú tar éis a ceaṫair am Nua-Eaḃrac ar ndóiġIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.

result.eng: The building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
result.ga: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úid
result.orig: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úid
result.html: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úidThe building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit an foirgneaṁ go talaṁ gan ċoinne i ndeireaḋ tráṫnóna an lae úidThe building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.

result.eng: I remember well the afternoon I left.
result.ga: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh mé
result.orig: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh mé
result.html: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh méI remember well the afternoon I left.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ is cuiṁin liom an tráṫnóna a d'imiġ méI remember well the afternoon I left.
